alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Vernon Parish through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slagle, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Slagle, Lacamp, Kurthwood and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and west central Louisiana.
